title: Crab and Shrimp Pasta Salad
ingredients: 16 ounce package uncooked tri-colored spiral pasta
½ cup mayonnaise, or more to taste
4 ounce can sliced black olives, drained
1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
instructions: 1. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold water to cool. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside. 2. Mix together mayonnaise, vinegar, oil, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Pour over pasta and stir to coat. 3. Add crab, shrimp, tomatoes, cucumber, black olives, and bell pepper; mix gently to coat with dressing. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired. If pasta is too dry, mix in more mayonnaise.
